description: I. Letter dated 22/12/2008 from John Armitt, Chairman, Olympic Delivery Authority, to Tessa Jowell MP regarding the value of all contracts awarded by the Olympic Delivery Authority to businesses and organisations in Wales. 2 p. II. Letter dated 28/01/2009 from Tessa Jowell MP to Cheryl Gillan MP confirming receipt of the above letter, and summarising its contents. 2 p.
department: Olympic Delivery Authority Minister for the Olympics
